name: Fundamentals of Programming I
description: Introduction to programming, problem-solving, and algorithms using a high-level programming language.

name: Fundamentals of Programming II
description: Continuation of programming fundamentals with an emphasis on object-oriented programming.

name: Discrete Structures of Mathematics
lecturer: Niyazi Anıl Gezer, Anıl Özdemir, Bengisen Pekmen
description: Introduction to mathematical logic, set theory, combinatorics, and graph theory for computer science.

name: Digital Systems
description: Fundamentals of digital logic design, combinational circuits, and sequential circuits.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms I
description: Introduction to data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms II
description: Advanced data structures and algorithms, including trees, graphs, and sorting algorithms.

name: Database Systems
description: Fundamentals of database design, relational models, and SQL programming.

name: Game Programming
description: Introduction to game development principles, graphics, and physics programming.

name: Theory of Computation
description: Study of formal languages, automata theory, and Turing machines.

name: Information Security and Cryptography
description: Introduction to cryptographic principles and techniques for secure communication.

name: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Study of object-oriented principles and design patterns in software development.

name: Software Engineering
description: Introduction to software development processes, requirements analysis, and testing.

name: Operating Systems
description: Concepts of operating systems including processes, threads, and memory management.

name: Computer Networks
description: Study of network architectures, protocols, and data communication techniques.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Introduction to AI concepts, search algorithms, and basic machine learning techniques.

name: Machine Learning
description: Introduction to supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning methods.

name: Human-Computer Interaction
description: Principles and methods of designing user-centered interfaces.

name: Introduction to Robotics
description: Fundamentals of robotics, sensors, and actuators.

name: Embedded Systems
description: Design and implementation of software for embedded hardware platforms.

name: Mobile Application Development
description: Development of mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms.

name: Parallel Computing
description: Study of parallel computing architectures and parallel programming models.

name: Cryptography
description: Advanced study of cryptographic systems and security protocols.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Introduction to cloud computing concepts, architectures, and services.

name: Big Data Analytics
description: Techniques for processing, analyzing, and visualizing large datasets.

name: Software Project Management
description: Study of project management principles and practices in software development.
